title: 服务器使用metachanger的biome setter时候崩溃
author: pasibear
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
这个调用了客户端上的类，而服务器上自然没有，所以就崩溃了。

而且作者说。
This mod was created for all the people who struggle with building using texture packs by the likes of Conquest, and want to work on a SinglePlayer world instead of a server.
https://www.planetminecraft.com/mod/meta-changer/

所以，你可以试试用创世神更改生物群系

replies.author: pasibear
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽
